title: Pet Friendly Studio in Capitol Hill w/ AC
posting_body: ['1170 Corona Street managed by Cornerstone Apartments', 'Bedrooms:', '0', 'Bathrooms:', '1', 'Square Ft.:', '265', 'Price:', '$1175/mo.', 'Enjoy an eclectic part of Capitol Hill that balances historic charm and urban lifestyle at the Crown Apartments!', 'Set roots in a gorgeous studio or one-bedroom home while mingling with neighbors and pets alike on the community patio.', "A half-mile walk to the west drops you in the middle of Denver's famous Cheesman Park, and popular grocery stores, bars, restaurants and shops surround the neighborhood.", '1170 Corona Street is the perfect place to take advantage of 300 days of sunshine!', 'Features:', 'A/C', 'Wood Style Flooring', 'Garage Parking', 'Community Room/Patio', 'On-Site Laundry', 'Smoke-Free Building', 'Bike Storage', 'Shared Community WiFi', 'Contact us:', 'To schedule a showing please contact our leasing team at', 'To apply NOW please visit <URL>', 'Nearby Neighborhoods:', "Jefferson Park, Cheesman Park, University of Denver, Sloan's Lake, LoHi, Five Points, Baker, RiNo, City Park, West Wash Park, Congress Park, Platt Park, Capitol Hill, Downtown, Uptown, Highlands, Hale", 'Availability and pricing are subject to change.']
